pathAssistantSteps.info:
Checklist


  • Complete/update company profile on account
  • Nominate Key Customer Contacts on account
  • Enter relevant Solution and opportunity Model on opportunity

Checklist


  • Request pricing from T1pricing (applies to all opportunity model types excluding Perpetual)
  • Populate 'Behavioural Discount %' field
  • Update opportunity model/solution details (if applicable)
  • Review and update opportunity close date (if required)
  • Complete Bid Qualification Form (tenders only) and submit to Bid Management team.
  • Enter Next Steps
  • Update tasks

Checklist


  • Request t1pricing update pricing in Salesforce (if applicable)
  • Update opportunity close date (if applicable)
  • Populate consulting data fields
  • Update opportunity model (if applicable)
  • Update Mobilisation Plan activities
  • Enter 'Proposed Customer discount %' (if applicable)
  • Enter 'Contract type'
  • Update 'Next steps'
  • Move opportunity into RM Forecast or Upside and populate RM Forecast/Upside Licence Fee and ARR fields

Checklist


  • Request t1pricing update pricing in Salesforce (if applicable)
  • Update opportunity close date (if required)
  • Populate consulting data fields (Consulting required, project start date, implementation services amount)
  • Update opportunity model (if applicable)
  • Update Mobilisation Plan activities
  • Update 'Next steps'
  • Update 'Proposed Customer Discount %' field (if applicable)
  • Update Forecast level and forecast value fields (if applicable)

Checklist


  • Request t1pricing update pricing in Salesforce (if applicable)
  • Update opportunity close date (if required)
  • Populate consulting data fields (Consulting required, project start date, implementation services amount)
  • Update opportunity model (if applicable)
  • Finalise Mobilisation Plan activities
  • Update 'Proposed Customer discount %' (if applicable)
  • Update Forecast level and forecast value fields (if applicable)

Congratulations on closing this deal!


Checklist


  • Request t1pricing update pricing in Salesforce (if applicable)
  • Update opportunity close date (if required)
  • Populate consulting data fields (Consulting required, project start date, implementation services amount)
  • Update opportunity model (if applicable)
  • Finalise Mobilisation Plan activities
  • Update 'Proposed Customer discount %' (if applicable)
  • Update Forecast level and forecast value fields (if applicable)

Checklist


  1. Finance sign-off
  2. Licence key issue to CAM/CDM
  3. Update finance amount
